comments:
description:
Exception throw out when new a table group with invalid group field

steps to reproduce:
1. New a table group 
2. In group properties dialog,type group on "h"
3. Click on OK.

actual result:
ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException throw out

expected result:
No exception throw out

Exception stack trace:

Handle invalid group field in group dialogue.
If the expression is invalid group key, the data item and the label is added all
the same.
